===Noun===
{{ja-noun|りくどう}}

# Alternate reading for 六道 (ろくどう, ''rokudō'').

{{ja-noun|ろくどう}}

# {{lb|ja|Buddhism|sort=ろくどう}} The six [[plane]]s, [[realm]]s, or [[domain]]s of existence into which souls are reborn in the cycle of [[samsara]]:
## {{l|ja|地獄道}} ({{l|ja|じごくどう}}, ''jigokudō''): [[hell]]
## {{l|ja|餓鬼道}} ({{l|ja|がきどう}}, ''gakidō''): life in [[starvation]] (one of the Buddhist hells)
## {{l|ja|畜生道}} ({{l|ja|ちくしょうどう}}, ''chikushōdō''): life as a [[beast]]
## {{l|ja|人間道}} ({{l|ja|にんげんどう}}, ''ningendō'') / {{l|ja|人道}} ({{l|ja|にんどう}}, ''nindō''): life as a [[human]]
## {{l|ja|阿修羅道}} ({{l|ja|あしゅらどう}}, ''ashuradō''): life as a [[demigod]]
## {{l|ja|天上}} ({{l|ja|てんじょう}}, ''tenjō''): [[heaven]]
* Note that the [[Theravada]] Buddhist tradition only recognizes five planes of existence, as Theravada does not distinguish between the ''ashura'' and ''heaven'' planes.
